support.title: Support Tickets
support.ticketsDesc: Manage and view support tickets for your offers
support.ticketsDescEmployee: Manage and respond to support tickets. You can also create tickets to communicate with traders.
support.createTicketDescEmployee: Create a support ticket for this offer to communicate with the trader
support.ticketInfoDescEmployee: Support tickets allow you to communicate with traders about issues related to their offers. The trader will be notified and can respond to your ticket.
support.createTicketDesc: Create a support ticket for this offer
support.subject: Subject
support.subjectRequiredDesc: Please enter a subject for your ticket
support.messageRequiredDesc: Please enter a message for your ticket
support.ticketClosed: Cannot send message to closed ticket
support.messageSentSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully
support.ticketCreatedSuccess: Your support ticket has been created successfully
support.statusUpdatedSuccess: Ticket status has been updated successfully
support.ticketInfoDesc: Support tickets allow you to communicate with employees about issues related to this offer. Your assigned employee will respond to your ticket.
support.howToCreate: How to Create a Support Ticket
support.howToCreateDesc: You can create a support ticket for an offer in the following ways:
support.method1Desc: Go to your offers list, click on an ACTIVE offer, then click the 'Create Support Ticket' button (green button).
support.method2Desc: In your offers list, click the support ticket icon (green message icon) next to any ACTIVE offer.
support.method3Desc: Go to Support Tickets page, click 'Go to My Offers' button, then select an ACTIVE offer.
